GK16vcamkc_u:2408: ardhīkṛtālakakucāphaṇi kahkaṇena mudrā kṛtā smarajitā likhitena tanvyā //
GK16vcamkc_u:2409: atra vidagdhayā kayāpi kāminyā priyayogyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpaśarapuṣpaṃdhayagandhavahābhimarśaḥ śaṅkyate so 'yaṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2416: śabdārthālaṅkārayoḥ śabdobhayālaṅkārayorarthobhayālaṅkārayośva saṅkara ubhayālaṅkāra eva svārthālaṅkāravaśāt saṅkarasyobhayāśritatvasiddheḥ saṃbhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16vcamkc_u:2419: atra sādhūnāmasaṃmatimasaṃbhāvanāṃ vindato 'labhyamānān sā dhvaṃsayati nāśayatīti sādhvasaṃmatividhvasi durjanatarjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2420: tādṛśaṃ siṅgabhūpālasevanaṃ kṛtvā nijagṛhe svagṛhe sthitairbhūpairmatividhvaṃsi sādhvasamiti yojanā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2421: atra nijagṛhe nigṛhītamiti kriyāpadaṃ nijagṛha iti saptamyā gūḍhamiti kriyāgūḍhalakṣaṇo viṣayapadāvṛttiyamakalakṣaṇasva śabdālaṅkārau saṃkīrṇāviti kevalaśabdālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2422: kevalārthālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā siṅgabhūpa vidadhāti tāvako dhīraṇorasiranaṃbudāśaniḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2423: kānane nagaravartino ripūna tatpure vipinavāsino mṛgān // Ckc_8.*111 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2428: atrevaśabdena sahārtha iva saṃbhāvamārtho 'pi dyotyata iti ekavācakānupraveśena sahokterutprekṣāyāśva saṅkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2429: sabdārthālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā tvayā dīnāriṇā rājan kṛtā dīnāriṇo mama /
GK16vcamkc_u:2431: atra prathamārdhe dīnāriṇā dīnārīti dvitīyapādamadhyayamakasyottarārdhe samagrāmavatā kṛteti virodhābhāsasya dvayossaṃkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2433: citraṃ janasya valayā valayā nitāntaṃ tāsāṃ sitāyatadṛśāmudare kare ca //
GK16vcamkc_u:2435_0: avalayan acalayan kare valayaḥ kaṭakamavalayamiti kartṛkriyāpadayorekavacanabahuvacane
GK16vcamkc_u:2435_1: śliṣṭe iti vacanaśleṣasya tārābhirindurivetyupamāyāśva viveko dṛsyata iti śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro
GK16vcamkc_u:2437: yathā ca māṇikyairiva gāṇikyaiḥ syandanairiva candanaiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2442: glānirvairibahadhūlatāsu dharaṇī viśrāmyati tvadbhuje viśrāmo bhuvi siṅgabhūpatimaṇeṃ nidrāṃnti vairistriyaḥ // Ckc_8.*116 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2444: śabdārthobhayālaṅkārasaṃkaro yathā śrīsiḍgakṣoṇibhartre diśi diśi sumanomānasollāsa kartre sāndrāmindro vibhūtiṃ śuciratiśucitāṃ dharmarājo 'ti dharmam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2445: rakṣāṃ rakṣo 'dhināthaḥ kuṭilavighaṭanodyogicetaḥ pracetā vāyussaṃpūrṇamāyurdhanamapi dhanadaśśaṃṅkaraḥ śaṃ karotu // Ckc_8.*117 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2446_0: atra diśi diśīti sumomānaseti śaṅkaraḥ śaṃ kotviti rakṣāṃ rakṣo iti vat chekānuprāsasya
GK16vcamkc_u:2446_1: sāndrāmidra ityādāvanuprāsasya sumanaśśleṣaḥ pratiśabdotthāpitena dikpāla rūpa...(madhyama?)
GK16vcamkc_u:2453: tatra guṇālaṅkārasaṅkaro yathā viśveśakalpitacamatkṛti ... ... ... siṅgayaśasā samamāvirāstām
GK16vcamkc_u:2462: iti sakalamapi kalyāṇam iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāra śītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāmaṣṭamo vilāsaḥ
